item.title: Re: "I need this" jutsu
item.content:encoded: Well, at least that explains why there's always such a shortage of smoke bombs … low supply (though I remember Billy having a higher drop rate before some change) and sky-high demand (XP runs and those people who just figure they'll escape out of missions until they get the one they want).

item.title: Re: "I need this" jutsu
item.content:encoded: Billy's smokebomb drop rate is horribly low. So low that I would highly, highly advise against trying to get smokebombs from him. If you're in S1 or S2, your best bet for smokebombs is to play the Slot machine in the party house. If you're S3+, turn on Filler, and buy fireworks.

item.title: Re: "I need this" jutsu
item.content:encoded:
First of all, Note pages have one of the lowest ally drop rates in the game.

Second you're using Olmek. I haven't seen any confirmation, but it seems that Olmek cuts ally drop rates by a third (which is then doubled 'cause that's what Olmek does, so it is a net gain, just a much smaller one than you might think.)

Are you using the Double drops theme?

Have you tried the juice bar? I'm pretty sure that one of the drinks increases ally drop rate.

item.title: "I need this" jutsu
item.content:encoded: I'm wondering if this jutsu is at all effective … I've taken the time to farm with it, and it seems that it doesn't help my drop rate at all. I was just trying to farm note pages from LisaLisa and the Paper, and only received one drop (doubled to 2 by Olmek) … and THAT was when I used EDUT on the C-rank mission I was on! I also had a day or two farming for smokebombs, which dropped equally poorly…
